item.title: San Marcos La Laguna Travel Guide (Lake Atitl√°n/Western Highlands/Guatemala/Central America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do to ensure a memorable trip to San Marcos La Laguna. This comprehensive travel guide includes suggestions for cultural attractions, natural attractions, hiking and biking routes, food and drink, accommodations, local culture and customs, safety and health, transportation options and logistics, and nearby destinations and excursions.
